subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Li Na beat Francesca Schiavone, 6-4, 7-6 (0), in the final, the first player from China to win a Grand Slam singles title.
snippet: Li Na beat Francesca Schiavone, 6-4, 7-6 (0), in the final, the first player from China to win a Grand Slam singles title.
